name: Distefano Law Office
goal: Distefano Law Office (DLO) is an independent law firm specialising in antitrust and regulatory law, and related litigation. Our team has significant experience in a wide range of competition and regulatory matters for international clients from various industry sectors. In particular, we assist clients from the chemicals and energy industries.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Internal Market
euInitiatives: Environmental policy and legislation, Climate Change Action, Energy and Renewables, Construction.
